org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor

类 TaskManagerServicesConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor.TaskManagerServicesConfiguration

  • public class TaskManagerServicesConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for the task manager services such as the network environment, the memory manager, the io manager and the metric registry.

      • getConfiguredMemory

        public long getConfiguredMemory()
        Returns the size of the managed memory (in megabytes), if configured.
        返回:
        managed memory or a default value (currently -1) if not configured
        另请参阅:
        TaskManagerOptions.MANAGED_MEMORY_SIZE

      • isPreAllocateMemory

        public boolean isPreAllocateMemory()

      • getTimerServiceShutdownTimeout

        public long getTimerServiceShutdownTimeout()

      • fromConfiguration

        public static TaskManagerServicesConfiguration fromConfiguration(Configuration configuration,
                                                                 java.net.InetAddress remoteAddress,
                                                                 boolean localCommunication)
                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Utility method to extract TaskManager config parameters from the configuration and to sanity check them.
        参数:
        configuration - The configuration.
        remoteAddress - identifying the IP address under which the TaskManager will be accessible
        localCommunication - True, to skip initializing the network stack. Use only in cases where only one task manager runs.
        返回:
        TaskExecutorConfiguration that wrappers InstanceConnectionInfo, NetworkEnvironmentConfiguration, etc.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • parseNetworkEnvironmentConfiguration

        private static NetworkEnvironmentConfiguration parseNetworkEnvironmentConfiguration(Configuration configuration,
                                                                                    boolean localTaskManagerCommunication,
                                                                                    java.net.InetAddress taskManagerAddress,
                                                                                    int slots)
                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the NetworkEnvironmentConfiguration from the given Configuration.
        参数:
        configuration - to create the network environment configuration from
        localTaskManagerCommunication - true if task manager communication is local
        taskManagerAddress - address of the task manager
        slots - to start the task manager with
        返回:
        Network environment configuration
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkNetworkConfigOld

        protected static void checkNetworkConfigOld(int numNetworkBuffers)
        Validates the (old) network buffer configuration.
        参数:
        numNetworkBuffers - number of buffers used in the network stack
        抛出:
        IllegalConfigurationException - if the condition does not hold

      • checkNetworkBufferConfig

        protected static void checkNetworkBufferConfig(int pageSize,
                                               float networkBufFraction,
                                               long networkBufMin,
                                               long networkBufMax)
                                        throws IllegalConfigurationException
        Validates the (new) network buffer configuration.
        参数:
        pageSize - size of memory buffers
        networkBufFraction - fraction of JVM memory to use for network buffers
        networkBufMin - minimum memory size for network buffers (in bytes)
        networkBufMax - maximum memory size for network buffers (in bytes)
        抛出:
        IllegalConfigurationException - if the condition does not hold

      • hasNewNetworkBufConf

        public static boolean hasNewNetworkBufConf(Configuration config)
        Returns whether the new network buffer memory configuration is present in the configuration object, i.e. at least one new parameter is given or the old one is not present.
        参数:
        config - configuration object
        返回:
        true if the new configuration method is used, false otherwise

      • parseQueryableStateConfiguration

        private static QueryableStateConfiguration parseQueryableStateConfiguration(Configuration config)
        Creates the QueryableStateConfiguration from the given Configuration.

      • checkConfigParameter

        static void checkConfigParameter(boolean condition,
                                 java.lang.Object parameter,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String errorMessage)
                          throws IllegalConfigurationException
        Validates a condition for a config parameter and displays a standard exception, if the the condition does not hold.
        参数:
        condition - The condition that must hold. If the condition is false, an exception is thrown.
        parameter - The parameter value. Will be shown in the exception message.
        name - The name of the config parameter. Will be shown in the exception message.
        errorMessage - The optional custom error message to append to the exception message.
        抛出:
        IllegalConfigurationException - if the condition does not hold
